II. Sir Peter Legh of Lyme, Kt Banneret, was at the battle of Agffleourt, Oet. 25, 1415, and died of his wounds at Paris, 1422, aet. 31 or 32. Nicolas, in his Battle of Ayincourt, mentions this 811 Peter as having been in the battle, and as having been one of the important personages there, (p. 128.) He calls him Sir Peter de Legh.
